# accelerometerSamples

**Instance Property**

The samples recorded by the photoplethysmogram (PPG) accelerometer.

## Declaration

```swift
var accelerometerSamples: [SRPhotoplethysmogramAccelerometerSample] { get }
```

## Accessing PPG data

- **startDate**: The start date of the photoplethysmogram (PPG) sensor data recording.
- **nanosecondsSinceStart**: The time in nanoseconds since the start of the data recording.
- **usage**: The method that the person or system uses to take the reading.
- **SRPhotoplethysmogramSample.Usage**: The possible ways that a person or the system may take a photoplethysmogram (PPG) reading.
- **opticalSamples**: The samples recorded by the photoplethysmogram (PPG) optical sensor.
- **SRPhotoplethysmogramOpticalSample**: A data sample from the photoplethysmogram (PPG) optical sensor.
- **SRPhotoplethysmogramAccelerometerSample**: A data sample from the photoplethysmogram (PPG) accelerometer.
- **temperature**: The samples recorded by the photoplethysmogram (PPG) thermometer.
